subject: Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show
Dogs
lead_paragraph: When the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show comes to town, the Hotel Pennsylvania literally goes to the dogs. A specialty spa and exercise center cater to hundreds of canine visitors and their owners.
snippet: When the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show comes to town, the Hotel Pennsylvania literally goes to the dogs. A specialty spa and exercise center cater to hundreds of canine visitors and their owners.
